overview: Matt Daniel leads the field and inside sales teams and is responsible for strategic planning and tactical execution required to expand ClickSafety’s sales revenue. Most recently, Matt served as Director, New Business Development for McGraw-Hill Construction, leading efforts in driving new business acquisition and business process improvements as a black belt on several Lean Six Sigma projects within the Contractors and Services sales channel. Previously, at McGraw-Hill Construction, Matt held National & Global accounts leadership positions.
